scripts.build: bun run build:packages && bun run build:web
scripts.build:packages: bun run clean:packages && bun run build:utils && bun run build:workspace && bun run build:mcp && bun run build:provider && bun run build:session && bun run build:api
scripts.build:session-deps: bun run clean:packages && bun run build:utils && bun run build:workspace && bun run build:mcp && bun run build:provider
scripts.test: bun run test:packages && bun run test:web
scripts.test:packages: bun run build:packages && bun run test:utils && bun run test:workspace && bun run test:mcp && bun run test:provider && bun run test:session
scripts.test:workspace: bun run --cwd packages/utils build && bun run --cwd packages/workspace test
scripts.test:mcp: bun run --cwd packages/utils build && bun run --cwd packages/mcp test
scripts.test:provider: bun run --cwd packages/utils build && bun run --cwd packages/provider test
scripts.test:session: bun run build:session-deps && bun run --cwd packages/session test
scripts.dev:all: bun run dev:api & bun run dev:web
scripts.lint: bun run lint:packages && bun run lint:web
scripts.clean: bun run clean:packages && bun run clean:web
scripts.clean:packages: bun run clean:utils && bun run clean:workspace && bun run clean:mcp && bun run clean:provider && bun run clean:session && bun run clean:api
